snippet.title: ZOIDS WILD ARENA - Gameplay
snippet.description:
ZOIDS WILD ARENA is a trading card game (TCG) that incorporates units from the ZOIDS WILD franchise. The game allows players to purchase cards to form a deck using 30 cards, which will allow them to battle against each other for supremacy. Every card can be upgraded all the way to 6 stars, so everyone has a chance to build powerful decks without relying on luck. Test your wits against others all over the world!

Official Website: https://zoidswild.io
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ZoidsWild
Discord Channel: https://discord.gg/zoidswild
